td.content: s:M aged 27 years presents with 14 months history of moderate recurrent chest pain, moderate fever and moderate b/l leg pain. he denies smoking he denies drinking alcohol o:Height 170 cm, Weight 56.8 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 68, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 17, Skin = pale mucous membrane, Skin = pallor a:Sickle Cell Anemia p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed dilaudid - 0.015 mg/kg every 3 hours, and ordered Hemoglobin electrophoresis, Hand XRY.

s:a 28 year old M soldier presents with moderate vomiting, mild vague postprandial epigastric pain and moderate weight loss over several months. he is having symptoms 18 x week, in spite of treatment. Denies ever using tobacco Patient reports that he never drinks alcohol o:Height 170 cm, Weight 57.8 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 69, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 74, Respiration 18 a:Stomach Cancer p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed 5-FU - 1000 mg/m2 IV, cisplatin - 100 mg/m2 IV, and ordered EGD.

td.content: s:male soldier aged 28 yrs presents for exam. patient denies weight loss over several months, vomiting and vague postprandial epigastric pain. o:Height 169 cm, Weight 55.9 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 68, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 16, EGD shows esophagitis with a massive gastric ulcer extending from the inscura to the pylorus, no active bleeding was noted at the site a:Stomach Cancer p:performed EGD, and performed E/M Level 1 (new patient) - Completed.

s:pt presents with moderate cloudiness in eyes x 2 weeks. he is a M soldier aged 28 years. o:Height 170 cm, Weight 57.4 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 69, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 18 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.
